title: Forecast Seasonal Demand
description: An inventory analyst needs to forecast demand for a seasonal item (e.g., winter coats) to inform purchasing decisions.

tasks.description: Retrieve the sales history for the item for the past three years.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the historical sales data.

tasks.description: Apply a seasonal forecasting model to the historical data to predict demand for the upcoming season.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a demand forecast, showing an expected peak in November.

tasks.description: Generate a report with the forecast and recommended purchasing plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an actionable report for the buying team.
